00021 #include <fstream>
00022 #include <Camgen/if_output.h>
00023 
00024 namespace Camorra
00025 {
00027 
00028     template<class model_t>class LHE_file: public interface_output<model_t>
00029     {
00030         typedef interface_output<model_t> base_type;
00031 
00032         public:
00033 
00034             /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036             typedef model_t model_type;
00037             typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00038             typedef vector<value_type,model_t::dimension> momentum_type;
00039 
00040             const unsigned idwup;
00041 
00042             /* Constructor: */
00043 
00044             LHE_file(const std::string& file_name_,unsigned idwup_=1):base_type(file_name_),idwup(idwup_),line(0){}
00045 
00046             /* Constructor with description: */
00047 
00048             LHE_file(const std::string& file_name_,const std::string description_,unsigned idwup_=1):base_type(file_name_,description_),idwup(idwup_),line(0){}
00049 
00050             /* Destructor: */
00051 
00052             ~LHE_file(){}
00053 
00054             /* Creation method implementation: */
00055 
00056             interface_output<model_t>* create(const std::string& file_name_) const
00057             {
00058                 return new LHE_file<model_t>(file_name_,this->description,idwup);
00059             }
00060 
00061             /* Opens the (temporary) datafile. */
00062 
00063             bool open_file()
00064             {
00065                 std::string fname=this->file_name+".LHE";
00066                 ofs.open(fname.c_str());
00067                 if(ofs.is_open())
00068                 {
00069                     return true;
00070                 }
00071                 return false;
00072             }
00073 
00074             /* Closes the datafile. */
00075 
00076             bool close_file()
00077             {
00078                 if(ofs.is_open())
00079                 {
00080                     ofs.close();
00081                 }
00082                 return !(ofs.is_open());
00083             }
00084 
00087 
00088             bool write_event(const ps_generator_base<model_t>* gen)
00089             {
00090             }
00091 
00092         protected:
00093 
00094             bool write_init(const ps_generator_base<model_t>* gen)
00095             {
00096                 if(!ofs.is_open())
00097                 {
00098                     return false;
00099                 }
00100                 ofs<<"<LesHouchesEvents version=\"1.0\">"<<std::endl;
00101                 ofs<<"<!--"<<std::endl;
00102                 ofs<<"File written by Camgen "<<VERSION<<" on "<<__DATE__<<" at "<<__TIME__<<std::endl;
00103                 ofs<<"-->"<<std::endl;
00104                 ofs<<"<init>"<<std::endl;
00105                 ofs<<"\t"<<beam_id1<<"\t"<<beam_id2;
00106                 ofs<<"\t"<<beam_E1<<"\t"<<beam_E2;
00107                 ofs<<"\t"<<pdf_authors1<<"\t"<<pdf_authors2;
00108                 ofs<<"\t"<<pdf_cernlib_code1<<"\t"<<pdf_cernlib_code2<<std::endl;
00109                 ofs<<"\t"<<weight_switch<<"\t 1 \t"<<this->Xsec<<"\t"<<this->sigma_Xsec<<"\t"<<this->max_wght<<"\t9999"<<std::endl;
00110                 ofs<<"</init>"<<std::endl;
00111             }
00112 
00113         private:
00114 
00115             /* Output file stream: */
00116 
00117             std::ofstream ofs;
00118 
00119             /* Number of events written */
00120 
00121             int line;
00122     };
00123 }
